title: S&t Bancorp Inc (STBA) Discloses Form 4 Insider Selling : Exec. James Thomas ...
text:
By Serena Taylor - Jul 28, 2015 
S&t Bancorp Inc (STBA) Discloses Insider Transaction. James Thomas Gibson , director of S&t Bancorp Inc sold 75,000 shares on Jul 22, 2015. The Insider selling transaction was disclosed on Jul 24, 2015 to the Securities and Exchange Commission. The shares were sold at $32.26 per share for a total value of $2,440,795.00. 
Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) rose by 1.5% in the past week and 4.68% for the last 4 weeks. In the past week, the counter has outperformed the S&P 500 by 3.79% and the outperformance increases to 5.77% for the last 4 weeks. 
Company shares have received an average consensus rating of Hold for the current week S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 14.66% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 6.91%.‚Äù The company shares have rallied 33.87% in the past 52 Weeks. On July 22, 2015 The shares registered one year high of $32.88 and one year low was seen on October 8, 2014 at $23.07. The 50-day moving average is $29.84 and the 200 day moving average is recorded at $28.6. S&P 500 has rallied 5.09% during the last 52-weeks. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) witnessed a decline in the market cap on Friday as its shares dropped 1.12% or 0.355 points. After the session commenced at $31.64, the stock reached the higher end at $31.7 while it hit a low of $31.17. With the volume soaring to 124,721 shares, the last trade was called at $31.455. The company has a 52-week high of $32.88. The company has a market cap of $1,095 million and there are 34,813,000 shares in outstanding. The 52-week low of the share price is $23.07. 
On a different note, The Company has disclosed insider buying and selling activities to the Securities Exchange, According to the information disclosed by the Securities and Exchange Commission in a Form 4 filing, the Director of S&T Bancorp Inc, Gibson James Thomas had sold 75,000 shares worth of $2,419,500 in a transaction dated July 22, 2015. In this transaction, 75,000 shares were sold at $32.26 per share. Currently the company Insiders own 3.3% of S&T Bancorp Inc. Company shares. In the past six months, there is a change of -10.2% in the total insider ownership. Institutional Investors own 46.2% of Company shares. During last 3 month period, 0.04% of total institutional ownership has changed in the company shares. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (S&T) is a bank holding company and has three wholly owned subsidiaries, S&T Bank, 9th Street Holdings, Inc. and STBA Capital Trust I. The Company also owns certain interest in Commonwealth Trust Credit Life Insurance Company. As of December 31, 2012, the Company had approximately $3.4 billion in loans and $3.6 billion in deposits. S&T Bank is a full service bank. It provides its services to its customers through offices located in Allegheny, Armstrong, Blair, Butler, Cambria, Clarion, Clearfield, Indiana, Jefferson and Westmoreland counties of Pennsylvania. It operates in three segments: Community Banking, Wealth Management and Insurance. Its Community Banking segment offers services, which include accepting time and demand deposit accounts, originating commercial and consumer loans, and providing letters of credit and credit card services. The Wealth Management segment offers discount brokerage services, services as executor and trustee under wills and deeds. SHARE
